body_html: Sorry to dig this up again, but are there any plans to incorporate the polygamma function (1) in the near future? Anything using a Dirichlet / Beta prior distribution will utilise the digamma function, for which the gradient is the polygamma.
body_text: Sorry to dig this up again, but are there any plans to incorporate the polygamma function (1) in the near future? Anything using a Dirichlet / Beta prior distribution will utilise the digamma function, for which the gradient is the polygamma.
body: Sorry to dig this up again, but are there any plans to incorporate the polygamma function (1) in the near future? Anything using a Dirichlet / Beta prior distribution will utilise the digamma function, for which the gradient is the polygamma.
